message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product for $9,500. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $8,500 is too low.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $8,750? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
